LanguageData.VGE_EmergencyLaunch.label: emergency launch
LanguageData.VGE_EmergencyLaunch.description: Use the piloting console to trigger an immediate emergency launch, landing in a random nearby location with a guaranteed mishap happening. Anyone outside of the gravship will be left behind.
LanguageData.VGE_AnalyzeTheStars.label: analyze the stars
LanguageData.VGE_AnalyzeTheStars.description: Use a telescope to analyze the stars to detect a new orbital location nearby.
LanguageData.VGE_EngineeringCommand.label: engineering command
LanguageData.VGE_EngineeringCommand.description: Offer guidance on maintenance and gravship construction efforts, boosting construction and maintenance abilities for everyone nearby. The effect remains attached to the caster for 24 hours.
